price: Na tukawapa wawili hao Kitabu kinacho bainisha.
footnotes: Na tukampa Musa na Haruni Kitabu kilicho wazi chenye kubainisha hukumu za Dini, nacho ni Taurati.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

translations: And We gave both of them
